content: I believe the end is near for Tim Geithner as Sec. of the Treasury. IMO he is a crook first and a Obama Yes man second. I believe that the main reason nobody wants the job as his assistant is because the economy is a mess and nobody wants to waste their time trying to fix it and second that there is no plan in place to fix it. That said I give Geithner another 6 to 10 months in office before he is gone. I also believe Richard Dodd will be out of office soon too. What say you?

content: Here's the problem: Even if Geithner is forced out as Sec, who will replace him if not just another crook from inside the system? The whole banking and financial system is corrupt to it's core, but only insiders understand it enough to be able to function as Sec. of the Treasury. They've got the President's hands effectively tied and that's exactly how they are able to make or break any President.
